org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.serialization

接口 RecordSerializer<T extends org.apache.flink.core.io.IOReadableWritable>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    SpanningRecordSerializer

    public interface RecordSerializer<T extends org.apache.flink.core.io.IOReadableWritable>
    Interface for turning records into sequences of memory segments.

    • 嵌套类概要

      Setter for the reporter, e.g. for the number of records emitted and the number of bytes read.
